page.title: 06LIFESTYLES - Allotments.
page.content: In my area there are a number of {allotments.}These are{parcels of land of about{one-tenth of an acre.}They are used for{growing vegetables, {keeping birds}such as pigeons or hens, and also for{rearing animals}such as goats, rabbits, and pigs. The most{popular vegetables,}I think, would be the{potato}and {cabbage.}On our allotment, we have a hut in which we grow{tomatoes.}We also grow{peas, beans, lettuce,}and{leeks. Our allotment is a large one. It measures{35 metres by 10 metres.}My grandad does most of the work because my dad works away. The{parish council owns}the{land and the{annual rental is Â£10.}Other local allotments belong to{Skelton {Castle Estates.
